languages.text: "Проклятый скоморох кличет пастью портал на ристалище. Только какой в этом смысл? Он просто вернет нас обратно в Прорву!"

traits.locale_text: "Проклятый скоморох кличет пастью портал на ристалище. Только какой в этом смысл? Он просто вернет нас обратно в Прорву!"

languages.text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"
languages.original_text: "Проклятый скоморох кличет пастью портал на ристалище. Только какой в этом смысл? Он просто вернет нас обратно в Прорву!"

traits.locale_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"
"When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"
"When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"
"When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

languages.text: “那个该死的小丑提到的‘巨口’，应该就是指竞技场的入口。但回到那里有什么意义？它只会把我们带回裂隙！”
languages.original_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

traits.locale_text: “那个该死的小丑提到的‘巨口’，应该就是指竞技场的入口。但回到那里有什么意义？它只会把我们带回裂隙！”

languages.text: «Cuando el bufón maldito dice "fauces", se refiere al portal del estadio. Pero ¿qué sentido tiene eso? ¡Nos llevará de vuelta al Abismo!».
languages.original_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el bufón maldito dice "fauces", se refiere al portal del estadio. Pero ¿qué sentido tiene eso? ¡Nos llevará de vuelta al Abismo!».

languages.text: 「このふざけた道化師が言う"口"とは闘技場のポータルのことだろう。しかし、奴の言うとおりなら亀裂に戻ってくるだけじゃないか！」
languages.original_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

traits.locale_text: 「このふざけた道化師が言う"口"とは闘技場のポータルのことだろう。しかし、奴の言うとおりなら亀裂に戻ってくるだけじゃないか！」

languages.text: "Wenn der verfluchte Narr 'Mund' sagt, meint er das Portal im Stadion. Doch welchen Sinn ergibt das? Es bringt uns nur zurück zur Kluft!"
languages.original_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn der verfluchte Narr 'Mund' sagt, meint er das Portal im Stadion. Doch welchen Sinn ergibt das? Es bringt uns nur zurück zur Kluft!"

languages.text: « Cette "gueule" dont parle le bouffon maudit est le portail de l'arène. Mais pourquoi l'emprunter ? Il nous ramènera dans l'Abîme ! »
languages.original_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette "gueule" dont parle le bouffon maudit est le portail de l'arène. Mais pourquoi l'emprunter ? Il nous ramènera dans la Faille ! »

languages.text: "Lanet olası soytarı, 'ağız' derken stadyumdaki portalı kastediyor. İyi de bunun ne manası var? Bizi Yarık'a geri götürmekten başka işe yaramayacak!"
languages.original_text: "When the cursed jester says 'mouth,' he means the portal at the stadium. But where is the sense in that? It will just take us back to the Chasm!"

traits.locale_text: "Lanet olası soytarı, 'ağız' derken stadyumdaki portalı kastediyor. İyi de bunun ne manası var? Bizi Yarık'a geri götürmekten başka işe yaramayacak!"
